title: How to Make Vegetable Paniyaram

Drain the water, wash again and grind it into a smooth paste using a blender.

text: Preparing the idli batter For making the idli batter, you need these ingredients: 3 cups parboiled rice  1 cup urad dal (split black lentils) salt to taste oil for greasing Wash and soak the rice and urad dal in lukewarm water for 2 to 3 hours.  Drain the water, wash again and grind it into a smooth paste using a blender.  Cover the mixture. Keep it overnight to ferment. Add salt to the mixture. Your idli batter will be ready the next day. Making the Vegetable Paniyaram For making the vegetable paniyaram, you will need: Oil Mustard seeds Jeera Curry leaves Green chillies Two finely chopped onions One grated carrot Some grated zucchini Paniyaram pan Heat some oil in a pan. Add the mustard seeds. Add the jeera, curry leaves and green chillies. When it sizzles, add the chopped onions. Wait for the onions to caramelize  Add the grated carrots and zucchini. Fry for some minutes. Now add the above vegetable mixture to the idli batter that we had prepared earlier.  Mix well. Heat the paniyaram pan. Add few drops of oil to each mould.  Pour one tablespoon of idli batter into each paniyaram mould.  After some seconds, turn the paniyaram. Wait for it to cook. That's it. Your vegetable paniyaram is ready. It can be served with Indian chutneys for even better taste.
